class  AggOO::vs::path_vertices
 Defines a path. Allows for retrieving the vertices of the path. More...

Detailed Description

Used for parsing a vector shape file. Allows retrieval of the vertices. The idea is for it to be generalized so that any parser can use a single path_vertices object.
